translations.english: In the eleventh year winter, the emperor was at Handan.

translations.chinese: 豨將侯敞將萬餘人游行，王黃將騎千餘軍曲逆，張春將卒萬餘人度河攻聊城。
translations.english: Xi's general Hou Chang led over ten thousand men to roam, Wang Huang led over a thousand cavalry to camp at Qu Ni, Zhang Chun led over ten thousand troops to cross the river and attack Liaocheng.

translations.chinese: 漢將 軍郭蒙與齊將擊，大破之。
translations.english: Han general Guo Meng together with Qi generals attacked and greatly defeated them.

translations.chinese: 太尉周勃道太原入定代地，至馬邑，馬邑不下，攻殘之。
translations.english: Grand marshal Zhou Bo took the Taiyuan route to pacify Dai territory, reaching Mayi. Mayi did not submit, so he attacked and devastated it.

translations.chinese: 豨將趙利守東垣，高祖攻之不下。
translations.english: Xi's general Zhao Li defended Dongyuan. Gaozu attacked but could not take it.
